auth.signInMessage: Please sign in to Yanhekt to access all resources.
auth.accessMessage: You can now access all resources from Yanhekt.

settings.slideDetectionDescription: The interval will be automatically adjusted based on playback speed.
settings.slideStabilityDescription: Prevents false detection from animations by confirming a new slide after it remains unchanged for several consecutive checks.
settings.taskSpeedDescription: Playback speed for automated task processing.

advanced.tokenDescription: Manually input your authentication token for direct access.
advanced.ssimDescription: Higher global structural similarity threshold indicate stricter matching. You can test the detection accuracy in Menu > Help > SSIM Test.
advanced.ssimWarning: Adjust ONLY IF NECESSARY, as a minor change of 0.001 can significantly impact performance.

classroomRules.title: Adaptive Classroom Rules
classroomRules.description: When using Adaptive mode, SSIM threshold is automatically adjusted based on classroom location:
classroomRules.reason: These buildings have older equipment and poorer screen recording quality, requiring a more lenient threshold.

advanced.videoErrorDescription: Number of retry attempts when video playback errors occur.
advanced.preventSystemSleepDescription: Prevent the system from going to sleep during video playback to avoid interruptions.
advanced.concurrentDownloadDescription: Maximum number of simultaneous downloads and processing.
advanced.cacheManagementDescription: Manage application cache and temporary files to free up disk space.
advanced.clearCacheMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all cache files?
advanced.clearCacheDetail: This will remove temporary files, logs, and other cached data. This action cannot be undone.
advanced.resetAllDataMessage: This will completely reset the application to factory settings.
advanced.resetAllDataDetail: All settings, cache, logs, and user data will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
advanced.finalConfirmationMessage: Are you absolutely sure you want to reset ALL data?
advanced.finalConfirmationDetail: This will delete everything and the application will restart as if newly installed.
advanced.resetSuccess: Application data has been reset successfully
advanced.restartRequiredMessage: The application needs to restart to complete the reset.
advanced.restartRequiredDetail: Click 'Restart Now' to restart immediately, or 'Restart Later' to restart manually.
advanced.intranetMappingDescription: Domain to IP mappings used when internal network mode is enabled. These mappings allow the application to access internal servers directly within the campus network.

welcome.title: Welcome to AutoSlides
welcome.subtitle: Designed for BIT students
welcome.liveDescription: Browse and join live lectures across the entire campus, while also capturing real-time slides.
welcome.recordedDescription: Access courses recordings, download videos for offline viewing, and extract slides from recordings.

tasks.noTasks: No slide extraction tasks in queue
tasks.noTasksDescription: Add recorded sessions to queue to automatically extract slides

playback.networkProblems: This may be due to video quality issues or network problems. Consider downloading this video for offline viewing to avoid playback interruptions.
playback.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
playback.taskInProgress: Task in progress. Controls are disabled. If you exit, the task queue will be paused and current task progress will be lost. To adjust settings, please manually pause the task list.
playback.highSpeedWarning: High-speed playback may cause buffering issues. Consider switching to internal network mode for optimal performance at higher speeds.
playback.videoPlayingInPiP: Video playing in Picture in Picture mode

sessions.noSessions: No sessions found for this course.
sessions.alreadyInTaskQueue: This session is already in the task queue
sessions.alreadyInDownloadQueue: This camera video is already in the download queue
sessions.alreadyInDownloadQueueScreen: This screen video is already in the download queue
sessions.allInTaskQueue: All sessions are already in the task queue
sessions.addedToDownloadQueue: Added {count} camera videos to download queue
sessions.allInDownloadQueue: All camera videos are already in the download queue
sessions.addedToDownloadQueueScreen: Added {count} screen videos to download queue
sessions.allInDownloadQueueScreen: All screen videos are already in the download queue

welcome.title: Welcome to AutoSlides!
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started with the application.

liveMode.title: Live Mode
liveMode.description: This mode is for accessing live streaming courses. You can join ongoing lectures and capture slides in real-time.

searchButton.title: Restart Tour
searchButton.description: Click this search button anytime to restart the application tour and get help navigating the interface.

loginSection.title: Authentication
loginSection.description: This is where you sign in to access all AutoSlides features. Enter your credentials to get started.

leftPanel.title: Control Panel
leftPanel.description: Now you're logged in! This left panel is your control center where you can modify various settings, adjust preferences, and monitor the application status.

connectionMode.title: Connection Mode
connectionMode.description: When you're on campus network, you can enable Internal Network mode for better connection experience and faster access to course resources.

modeSwitch.title: Mode Selection
modeSwitch.description: Switch between Live and Recorded modes. Live mode is for real-time streaming, while Recorded mode gives you access to course recordings.

searchRow.title: Search & Personal Courses
searchRow.description: Use the search bar to find specific courses, or click 'Get Personal Course List' to access your enrolled courses. This helps you quickly locate the content you need.

courseList.title: Course Gallery
courseList.description: Browse through available courses in this grid view. Each card shows course details including instructor, location, and participant count. Click any course to access its content.
